languages.text: "Скрывала. И презирала себя за это. Сестрам битвы надлежит смеяться в лицо лжи и интригам, а я... опасалась, что за убийство Вольного Торговца меня казнят на месте. Я понадеялась, что убийство спишут на культистов или Кунрада, и оказалась права. Но эта ложь... она жгла мне горло. И здесь, в ужасном мире вдали от света Терры, я поняла, что не могу больше молчать".

traits.locale_text: "Скрывала. И презирала себя за это. Сестрам битвы надлежит смеяться в лицо лжи и интригам, а я... опасалась, что за убийство Вольного Торговца меня казнят на месте. Я понадеялась, что убийство спишут на пиратов или Кунрада, и оказалась права. Но эта ложь... он жгла мне горло. И здесь, в ужасном мире вдали от света Терры, я поняла, что не могу больше молчать".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I did. And I despised myself for doing so. Sisters of Battle are taught to laugh in the face of lies and intrigue, but instead, I... I feared that I would face immediate execution for the murder of the Rogue Trader. I hoped that people would think it was Voigtvir or the cultists who killed her, and I was right. But that lie... it burned in my throat. And here, in this horrific reality away from Terra's light, I realised that I could keep my silence no longer."
languages.original_text: "Скрывала. И презирала себя за это. Сестрам битвы надлежит смеяться в лицо лжи и интригам, а я... опасалась, что за убийство Вольного Торговца меня казнят на месте. Я понадеялась, что убийство спишут на культистов или Кунрада, и оказалась права. Но эта ложь... она жгла мне горло. И здесь, в ужасном мире вдали от света Терры, я поняла, что не могу больше молчать".

But that lie... it burned in my throat. And here, in this horrific reality away from Terra's light, I realised I could keep my silence no longer."

I feared that I would face immediate execution for the murder of the Rogue Trader. I hoped that people would think it was Voigtvir or the cultists who killed her, and I was right. But that lie... it burned in my throat. And here, in this horrific reality away from Terra's light, I realised that I could keep my silence no longer."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そうよ。そして、そんな自分を軽蔑したわ。戦闘修道女は嘘や陰謀を笑い飛ばすように教えられるけど、私はその代わりに、自由開拓者殺害の罪で即刻処刑されるのではないかと心配した。ボイドヴィルか魔女団が殺したと思われることを望んだけど、その通りになったわ。でも、その嘘は…私を苦しめた。そしてここで、地球の光から離れたこの恐ろしい現実で、私はもう沈黙を守ることができないと悟ったのよ。」
languages.original_text: "I did. And I despised myself for doing so. Sisters of Battle are taught to laugh in the face of lies and intrigue, but instead, I... I feared that I would face immediate execution for the murder of the Rogue Trader. I hoped that people would think it was Voigtvir or the cultists who killed her, and I was right. But that lie... it burned in my throat. And here, in this horrific reality away from Terra's light, I realised that I could keep my silence no longer."

traits.locale_text: 「そうよ。そして、そんな自分を軽蔑したわ。戦闘修道女は嘘や陰謀を笑い飛ばすように教えられるけど、私はその代わりに、自由開拓者殺害の罪で即刻処刑されるのではないかと心配した。ボイドヴィルか海賊が殺したと 思われることを望んだけど、その通りになったわ。でも、その嘘は…私を苦しめた。そしてここで、地球の光から離れたこの恐ろしい現実で、私はもう沈黙を守ることができないと悟ったのよ。」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “确实如此，而且我鄙夷我自己的行为。根据战斗修女的教诲，当我们面对谎言与阴谋时，我们本该在它们面前放声大笑，可我呢？我……我害怕自己因为杀害了行商浪人而被即刻处决。我希望别人误以为她死在了维特威尔或异端分子手上，而大家也确实是这么想的。但那个谎言……它灼烧着我的喉咙。在这里，在这远离泰拉之光的可怕世界之中，我意识到我不能继续保持沉默了。”
languages.original_text: "I did. And I despised myself for doing so. Sisters of Battle are taught to laugh in the face of lies and intrigue, but instead, I... I feared that I would face immediate execution for the murder of the Rogue Trader. I hoped that people would think it was Voigtvir or the cultists who killed her, and I was right. But that lie... it burned in my throat. And here, in this horrific reality away from Terra's light, I realised that I could keep my silence no longer."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，而且我鄙视我自己的行为。根据战斗修女的教诲，当我们面对谎言与阴谋时，我们本该在它们面前放声大笑，可我呢？我，呃，我害怕自己因为杀害了行商浪人而被即刻处决。我希望别人误以为她死在了维特威尔或海盗手上，而大家也确实是这么想的。但那个谎言……它灼烧着我的喉咙。在这里，在这远离泰拉之光的可怕世界之中，我意识到我不能继续保持沉默了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Lo hice y me odié por hacerlo. A las Hermanas de Batalla se les enseña a reírse ante las mentiras y las intrigas, pero en lugar de eso, yo... temía enfrentarme a una ejecución inmediata por el asesinato de la Comerciante Independiente. Esperaba que la gente pensara que fue Voigtvir o los cultistas quienes la mataron y tenía razón. Pero esa mentira... me quemaba la garganta. Y aquí, en esta horrible realidad lejos de la luz de Terra, me di cuenta de que no podía seguir callada».
languages.original_text: "I did. And I despised myself for doing so. Sisters of Battle are taught to laugh in the face of lies and intrigue, but instead, I... I feared that I would face immediate execution for the murder of the Rogue Trader. I hoped that people would think it was Voigtvir or the cultists who killed her, and I was right. But that lie... it burned in my throat. And here, in this horrific reality away from Terra's light, I realised that I could keep my silence no longer."

traits.locale_text: «Lo hice y me odié por hacerlo. A las Hermanas de Batalla se les enseña a reírse ante las mentiras y las intrigas, pero en lugar de eso, a mí... me preocupaba enfrentarme a una ejecución inmediata por el asesinato de la Comerciante Independiente. Esperaba que la gente pensara que fue Voigtvir o los piratas quienes la mataron y tenía razón. Pero esa mentira... me quemaba la garganta. Y aquí, en esta horrible realidad lejos de la luz de Terra, me di cuenta de que no podía seguir callada».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Und ich habe mich dafür verabscheut. Schwestern der Schlacht werden gelehrt, Lügen und Intrigen ins Gesicht zu lachen, aber stattdessen ... Stattdessen hatte ich Angst, dass ich für den Mord an der Freihändlerin sofort hingerichtet werden würde. Ich habe gehofft, alle würden glauben, dass Voigtvir oder die Kultisten sie getötet haben. Und ich hatte recht. Aber diese Lüge ... brannte mir in der Kehle. Und hier, in dieser grauenhaften Realität fern vom Lichte Terras, ist mir klargeworden, dass ich nicht länger schweigen kann."
languages.original_text: "I did. And I despised myself for doing so. Sisters of Battle are taught to laugh in the face of lies and intrigue, but instead, I... I feared that I would face immediate execution for the murder of the Rogue Trader. I hoped that people would think it was Voigtvir or the cultists who killed her, and I was right. But that lie... it burned in my throat. And here, in this horrific reality away from Terra's light, I realised that I could keep my silence no longer."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Und ich habe mich dafür verabscheut. Schwestern der Schlacht werden gelehrt, Lügen und Intrigen ins Gesicht zu lachen, aber stattdessen, äh, hatte ich Angst, dass ich für den Mord an der Freihändlerin sofort hingerichtet werden würde. Ich habe gehofft, alle würden glauben, dass Voigtvir oder die Piraten sie getötet haben. Und ich hatte recht. Aber diese Lüge ... hat mir in der Kehle gebrannt. Und hier, in dieser grauenhaften Realität fern vom Lichte Terras, ist mir klargeworden, dass ich nicht länger schweigen kann."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Oui. Et je me suis haïe pour ça. Les Sœurs de Bataille apprennent dès le plus jeune âge à rire des mensonges et des intrigues, mais au lieu de cela... j'ai eu peur d'être exécutée sur place pour le meurtre d'une libre-marchande. J'ai nourri l'espoir que les gens croient Voigtvir et ses cultistes responsables de la mort de Théodora, et le temps m'a donné raison. Mais ce mensonge... me brûlait la langue. Et ici, dans cette réalité abominable à des années-lumière de Terra, je me suis rendu compte que je ne pouvais plus garder le silence. »
languages.original_text: "I did. And I despised myself for doing so. Sisters of Battle are taught to laugh in the face of lies and intrigue, but instead, I... I feared that I would face immediate execution for the murder of the Rogue Trader. I hoped that people would think it was Voigtvir or the cultists who killed her, and I was right. But that lie... it burned in my throat. And here, in this horrific reality away from Terra's light, I realised that I could keep my silence no longer."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Et je me suis haïe pour ça. Les Sœurs de Bataille apprennent dès le plus jeune âge à rire des mensonges et des intrigues, mais... j'ai eu peur d'être exécutée sur place pour le meurtre d'une libre-marchande. J'ai nourri l'espoir que les gens croient Voigtvir et ses pirates responsables de la mort de Théodora, et le temps m'a donné raison. Mais ce mensonge... me brûlait la langue. Et ici, dans cette réalité abominable à des années-lumière de Terra, je me suis rendu compte que je ne pouvais plus garder le silence. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Evet. Bu yüzden kendimden nefret ettim. Harp Rahibeleri; yalana ve entrikaya düşmez, gülüp geçer ama ben... Hür Tacir'i öldürdüğüm için derhâl idam edileceğimi düşündüm. Voigtvir'in yahut tarikatçıların onu öldürdüğünü düşünmenizi istedim. Öyle de oldu. Ancak bu yalan... Bağrımı yaktı. İşte burada, Terra'nın nurundan uzak bu korkunç yerde sessizliğimi daha fazla koruyamayacağımı anladım."
languages.original_text: "I did. And I despised myself for doing so. Sisters of Battle are taught to laugh in the face of lies and intrigue, but instead, I... I feared that I would face immediate execution for the murder of the Rogue Trader. I hoped that people would think it was Voigtvir or the cultists who killed her, and I was right. But that lie... it burned in my throat. And here, in this horrific reality away from Terra's light, I realised that I could keep my silence no longer."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Bu yüzden kendimden nefret ettim. Harp Rahibeleri yalana ve entrikaya düşmez, gülüp geçer ama ben... Hür Tacir'i öldürdüğüm için derhâl idam edileceğimi düşündüm. Voigtvir'in yahut tarikatçıların onu öldürdüğünü düşünmenizi istedim; öyle de oldu. Ama bu yalan... bağrımı yaktı. İşte burada, Terra'nın nurundan uzak bu korkunç yerde sessizliğimi daha fazla koruyamayacağımı anladım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
